────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
 Toggle thinking mode
 Enable or disable thinking for this session.

 ❯ 1. Enabled ✔  Claude will think before responding
   2. Disabled   Claude will respond without extended thinking

 Enter to confirm · Esc to exit
